headline.main: Comment on "Let Us Face the Truth"; Time Out for Armament Urged

lead_paragraph: Your newspaper and the forces which support it apparently have a reckless disregard for the safety and welfare of the American people. In one breath you admit that the combined Axis fleets outmatch our own, and in the next you indirectly advocate war against the Axis powers.
abstract: Lrs on ed, Let us face the truth
